name: Sweet Pulao
steps: Clean and wash rice thoroughly and keep aside.
Heat puire ghee in a pressure cooker.
Add bay leaves, cinnamon, cardamoms and cloves and stirfry till the spices crackle.
Add the washed rice and fry for 2 minutes stirring continuously.
Add  peas, cashew nuts, raisins and fry for another 2 minutes stirring continuously to blend the mixture well.
Close lid and place pressure cooker on maximum heat.
When full cooking pressure is reached, reduce flame to medium heat and cook for 3 minutes.
Allow pressure cooker to cool for 2 minutes and open after releasing steam pressure.
